title: Arctic Race of Norway Stage 3: Kevin Bonneu Wins for His Late Grandfather, Magnus Cort Grabs Yellow
content:
American rider Kevin Vermaerke third on climbing stage, now third overall behind Cort and Bonneu with one stage remaining.

Read the full article at Arctic Race of Norway Stage 3: Kevin Bonneu Wins for His Late Grandfather, Magnus Cort Grabs Yellow on Velo.
author: sstokes
